name: Depleted
description:
Created in 48 hours for miniBeansjam 7.

Description

You are on a space station which is slowly collapsing. Find key cards and tools to approach an escape capsule before you are out of oxygen and the space station is fully collapsed.

Controls MoveA, DJumpSpaceUseWShootCtrl, Enter, Left MousePauseEscape
Created by
  • Sebastian Götze (Programming, Art)
  • Bastian Hümpel (Music, SFX, Programming, Art)

All Assets are created by ourself
